name: Bane of the Powerful
flavorText: "Few things embolden the spirit like a powerful enemy lying dead at your feet." -Andomiel Chu, Master Gem Cutter of Xiansai.
flavorTextHtml: "Few things embolden the spirit like a powerful enemy lying dead at your feet." -Andomiel Chu, Master Gem Cutter of Xiansai.

secondary.textHtml: Gain 20% increased damage for 30.0 seconds after killing an elite pack. 30.0
